title.en: Real Results You Can Actually Measure

description.en: Join the property managers who are crushing their goals while their tenants love them for it.
Automate manual workflows, reduce phone calls, eliminate paper notices, and cut administrative overhead significantly.
Streamlined maintenance ticketing and facility booking reduce staff workload and improve tenant satisfaction scores.
Real-time analytics on maintenance trends, facility usage, and tenant engagement help you make data-driven decisions.

subtitle.en: Everything you need to go live in 2 weeks. Then try it free for 90 days.

description.en: Fast, hassle-free onboarding with white-glove setup
Full platform access, then $168/month per building
SOC 2 certified, PDPO compliant, AWS hosted
Cancel anytime, no commitments, no hidden fees
Experience the full platform at no cost. Go live in 2 weeks with our proven onboarding process.
Our streamlined onboarding process gets you operational fast. We handle 100% of setup: data import, staff training, tenant onboarding, and technical configuration.
Full access to all features for 3 months. No feature limitations. Test everything risk-free before committing.

SOC 2 Type II certified. PDPO ready with enterprise infrastructure. Bank-grade encryption (AES-256). AWS hosted with 99.9% uptime SLA. Your tenant data is protected with industry-leading security practices.

ctaSubtext.en: Live in 2 weeks â€¢ $168/month per building after trial

title.en: Let's Talk About The Stuff You're Actually Wondering

description.en: No fluff, no jargon. Just honest answers to the questions you're too polite to ask. ğŸ˜Š

question.en: What if my tenants are elderly and don't use apps?

answer.en: Great question! Our beta buildings had 30%+ residents aged 65+, and we achieved 82% adoption. We provide large-print guides, in-person lobby demos, and a dedicated support hotline. Plus, the app is designed with elderly users in mindâ€”large text, simple navigation, Cantonese interface. Most "non-tech" residents use it daily after week 1.

question.en: We already use WhatsApp. Why switch?

answer.en: You don't have to choose! Many managers use both initially. But here's what changes: WhatsApp becomes "nice to have" instead of essential. With Neighbr, you get organized maintenance tracking (not screenshot chaos), scheduled announcements (not interrupting tenants at midnight), searchable history (not scrolling through 1,000 messages), and analytics (not guessing what's working). After 2 weeks, most teams barely open WhatsApp.

question.en: What if only 50% of tenants adopt it?

answer.en: Then you get your money back. We guarantee 80%+ adoption in 30 days. But realistically, here's what happens: Week 1, 40% sign up (early adopters). Week 2, they start using facility booking and love it. Week 3, word spreadsâ€”"Did you book the BBQ pit on the app?" Week 4, you're at 85%. Tenants adopt because it makes THEIR lives easier, not because you force them.

question.en: Can we cancel if it doesn't work out?

answer.en: Absolutely. Zero contracts. Cancel anytime. During your 90-day free pilot, there's nothing to cancelâ€”it's free. After that, if you continue, it's month-to-month. We'll even help export your data if you decide to leave. (Though we've never had a building cancel after seeing results.)

question.en: Do we need to change our current processes?

answer.en: Nope. Neighbr adapts to how YOU work, not the other way around. Keep using your current vendor management system, your accounting software, your existing workflows. We integrate alongside them. Think of us as adding a better "front door" for tenant interactions, not rebuilding your entire house.

question.en: How much does it really cost after the free trial?

answer.en: Simple, transparent pricing: $168/month per building. That's it. No hidden fees, no per-unit charges, no surprise costs. For a 100-unit building, that's less than $1.70/unit/monthâ€”less than you spend on printing notices. Compare that to saving 15+ staff hours weekly (HK$8,000+/month value). ROI is typically 10:1 in the first year.

question.en: What makes you different from [other property management software]?

answer.en: Three things: (1) We're built FOR Hong Kongâ€”Cantonese-first, designed for HK buildings, local support team. (2) Tenant-facingâ€”most "property management software" is admin-only. We give tenants self-service. (3) Adoption guaranteeâ€”we don't just sell software and disappear. We guarantee it works, or you don't pay.

tagline.en: The modern property management platform built specifically for Hong Kong.

mission.en: Building better communities, one building at a time.
